titles.title: A resolution designating March 22, 2009, as "National Rehabilitation Counselors Appreciation Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 3/18/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates March 22, 2009, as National Rehabilitation Counselors Appreciation Day. Commends: (1) rehabilitation counselors for their dedication and hard work; and (2) professional organizations for their efforts to assist those who require rehabilitation.
